languages.text: "По окончании послушничества я была направлена в каликсийскую ветвь ордена Пресвятой Девы-Мученицы и приставлена к ордену Пронатус. Миссия ордена важна и благородна — сестры Пронатус защищают великие имперские святыни. Мы охраняем их, поддерживаем в порядке, сопровождаем, если их выносят на поле боя или паломникам для поклонения".

traits.locale_text: "По окончании послушничества я была направлена в каликсийскую ветвь Ордена Пронатус. Миссия ордена важна и благородна — сестры Пронатус защищают великие имперские святыни. Мы охраняем их, поддерживаем в порядке, сопровождаем, если их выносят на поле боя".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."
languages.original_text: "По окончании послушничества я была направлена в каликсийскую ветвь ордена Пресвятой Девы-Мученицы и приставлена к ордену Пронатус. Миссия ордена важна и благородна — сестры Пронатус защищают великие имперские святыни. Мы охраняем их, поддерживаем в порядке, сопровождаем, если их выносят на поле боя или паломникам для поклонения".

traits.locale_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order Pronatus. The Order's mission is one that is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great Imperial relics. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought out onto the battlefield or for pilgrims to worship."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order Pronatus. The Order's mission is one that is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great Imperial relics. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought out onto the battlefield or for pilgrims to worship."

We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to worship."

traits.locale_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “当我从见习修女的身份毕业之后，我就被派往殉教圣女修会的卡利西斯分部，分配到了普罗图斯修会。普罗图斯修女负责保护帝国的伟大圣物，我们肩负着崇高而重要的使命，负责守卫、保存这些圣物。当这些圣物需要带到战场上，或是需要供朝圣者瞻仰时，我们还会负责护送它们。”
languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

traits.locale_text: “当我从见习修女的身份毕业之后，我就被派往殉教圣女修会的卡利西斯分部，分配到了普罗图斯修会。普罗图斯修女负责保护帝国的伟大圣物，我们肩负着崇高而重要的使命，负责守卫、保存这些圣物。当这些圣物需要带到战场上，或是需要供朝圣者瞻仰时，我们还会负责护送它们。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

languages.text: «Al terminar mi noviciado, me enviaron a la rama de Calixis de la Orden de Nuestra Señora Mártir, una Orden Pronatus. La misión de la orden es tan vital como noble: las hermanas Pronatus protegemos las grandes reliquias del Imperium. Las protegemos, las conservamos y las escoltamos cuando las llevan al combate o las presentan a los peregrinos para su veneración».
languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

traits.locale_text: «Al terminar mi noviciado, me enviaron a la rama de Calixis de la Orden de Nuestra Señora Mártir, una Orden Pronatus. La misión de la orden es tan vital como noble: las hermanas Pronatus protegemos las grandes reliquias del Imperium. Las protegemos, las conservamos y las escoltamos cuando las llevan al combate o las presentan a los peregrinos para su veneración».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「修練期間を終えると、私は殉教せし我らが聖女修道会のカリシャン支部に派遣され、考古修道会に配属された。修道会は、帝国の偉大な聖遺物を保護する重要かつ崇高な使命を持っている。我々は聖遺物を守り、保存し、戦場に持ち込まれた聖遺物を護衛し、巡礼者のために聖遺物を奉納するのだ」
languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

traits.locale_text: 「修練期間を終えると、私は殉教せし我らが聖女修道会のカリシャン支部に派遣され、考古修道会に配属された。修道会は、帝国の偉大な聖遺物を保護する重要かつ崇高な使命を持っている。我々は聖遺物を守り、保存し、戦場に持ち込まれた聖遺物を護衛し、巡礼者のために聖遺物を奉納するのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Nachdem ich mein Noviziat beendet hatte, wurde ich zum calixischen Zweig des Ordens der Heiligen Märtyrerin geschickt, der den Ordines Pronatus zugewiesen ist. Die Mission des Ordens ist ebenso wichtig wie edel — die Schwestern der Ordines Pronatus beschützen große Relikte des Imperiums. Sie bewachen sie, bewahren sie, eskortieren sie, wenn sie in die Schlacht geführt oder für Pilger zur Schau gestellt werden."
languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem ich mein Noviziat beendet hatte, wurde ich zum calixischen Zweig des Ordens der Heiligen Märtyrerin geschickt, der den Ordines Pronatus zugewiesen ist. Die Mission des Ordens ist ebenso wichtig wie edel — die Schwestern der Ordines Pronatus beschützen große Relikte des Imperiums. Sie bewachen sie, bewahren sie, eskortieren sie, wenn sie in die Schlacht geführt oder für Pilger zur Schau gestellt werden."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Une fois mon noviciat terminé, j'ai été envoyée dans la branche calixienne de l'Ordre de Notre-Dame des Martyrs, et assignée à l'Ordre Pronatus. Sa mission est noble et essentielle : les Sœurs Pronatus protègent les reliques majeures de l'Imperium. Nous les conservons, les préservons, les escortons lorsqu'elles sont emmenées sur le champ de bataille ou présentées aux pèlerins pour être vénérées. »
languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois mon noviciat terminé, j'ai été envoyée dans la branche calixienne de l'Ordre de Notre-Dame des Martyrs, et assignée à l'Ordre Pronatus. Sa mission est noble et essentielle : les Sœurs Pronatus protègent les reliques majeures de l'Imperium. Nous les conservons, les préservons, les escortons lorsqu'elles sont emmenées sur le champ de bataille ou présentées aux pèlerins pour être vénérées. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Acemiliğimi tamamladıktan sonra Şehit Hanım Düzeni'nin Calixis koluna gönderildim ve Pronatus Düzeni'ne verildim. Pronatus Düzeni, İmparatorluk'a ait yüce yadigârları korumak gibi son derece mühim ve onurlu bir vazifeyle yükümlüdür. Bu yadigârları koruyup kollar, muharebe meydanına getirilirken veya hürmetlerini sunmaları için hacılara gösterilirken onlara eşlik ederiz."
languages.original_text: "Once I had completed my novitiate, I was sent to the Calixian branch of the Order of Our Martyred Lady, assigned to the Orders Pronatus. The order's mission is vital and noble — the Sisters Pronatus protect great relics of the Imperium. We guard them, preserve them, escort them when they are brought onto the battlefield or presented for pilgrims to venerate."

traits.locale_text: "Talebeliğimi tamamladıktan sonra Şehit Hanım Düzeni'nin Calixis koluna gönderildim ve Pronatus Düzeni'ne verildim. Pronatus Düzeni, İmparatorluk'a ait yüce yadigârları korumak gibi son derece mühim ve onurlu bir vazifeyle yükümlüdür. Bu yadigârları korur, esirger ve muharebe meydanında yahut seyyahların huzurunda onlara eşlik ederiz."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
